title: Bug 11306 - Incorrect Wizard Launch in New Class Creation
description: The report pertains to an issue with the New Class Wizard.
OB: Upon creating a new class when there are no existing projects, if the user answers 'Yes' to create a new project, the resulting dialog displays the first page of the generic new project wizard instead of the expected Java Project wizard.
EB: When a user chooses to create a new project in this scenario, the Java Class wizard should open the Java Project wizard, ensuring the correct workflow is followed.
SR:
To replicate this problem, follow these steps:
1. In a fresh workspace, click on the 'New Class' button in the Java perspective.
2. Observe the unexpected outcome where, upon answering 'Yes' to create a new project, the resulting dialog displays the first page of the generic new project wizard rather than the anticipated Java Project wizard.
